title: Polaris Smart Metering gets Rs 5,200 crore smart meter project in Uttar Pradesh
description: Polaris Smart Metering has secured two smart meter projects in Uttar Pradesh worth a total of Rs 5,200 crore. The contracts, awarded by Madhyanchal Vidyut Vitran Nigam Limited (MVVNL), involve installing over 5.1 million smart meters in Lucknow and Ayodhya/Devipatan. Under the agreement, Polaris Smart Metering will supply, commission, install, and maintain the smart meters for the next 10 years.
